text: Burgdorf () is the largest city in the administrative district of Emmental in the canton of Berne in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Burgdorf 8699.jpg|Burgdorf File:BurgdorfStation.JPG|Burgdorf train station File:Castle burgdorf1.jpg|Burgdorf Castle ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * http://www.schloss-burgdorf.ch * Category:Municipalities in Emmental Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Burgdorf, Switzerland
